string.text: {PARENT_KINGDOM} has crushed the rebellion ravaging their kingdom. {PLAYER_PARTICIPATION}
{PARENT_KINGDOM} has lost their civil war and failed to keep their kingdom united. The {KINGDOM} has emerged. {PLAYER_PARTICIPATION}
A rebel faction has emerged in {KINGDOM}. They are led by clan {CLAN_NAME}. {DEMAND}
Withdraw from the kingdom. Members of this faction will form a new kingdom. Only Tier 4 or higher clans may start a secession faction.
Force the leader of the kingdom to step down. An election will decide the new leader of the kingdom.
The rebels demand that their lands be allowed to secede from the kingdom.
The rebels demand that {LEADER} abdicates their throne.
A civil war has broken out in {KINGDOM}. The {REBEL_KINGDOM} are led by clan {CLAN_NAME}. {DEMAND}
Rebel kingdoms can't be the target of diplomatic actions.
With the election of a new monarch and their objective complete, the {REBELS} of {PARENT_KINGDOM} disbands.
As leader of the rebellion, you gained {INFLUENCE} influence.
As leader of the rebellion, you lost {INFLUENCE} influence.
As a member of the rebellion, you gained {INFLUENCE} influence.
As a member of the rebellion, you lost {INFLUENCE} influence.
As leader of the loyalists, you lost {INFLUENCE} influence.
As leader of the loyalists, you gained {INFLUENCE} influence.
As a member of the loyalists, you lost {INFLUENCE} influence.
As a member of the loyalists, you gained {INFLUENCE} influence.
You cannot be part of a rebellion
{PARENT_KINGDOM} has lost its civil war to the {REBELS}. {LEADER} will abdicate the throne. {PLAYER_PARTICIPATION}
Ruler doesn't have Right to Rule
Can't start a faction during an active rebellion.
Can't start a faction so soon after a civil war.
Cannot create a faction in a rebel kingdom.
Must be Clan Tier 4 or higher.
Must be part of {KINGDOM_NAME} to create a {KINGDOM_NAME} faction.
A kingdom can only have one abdication faction.
Minimum Time Between Civil Wars In Days
The minimum amount of time required between a civil war and when new rebel factions can arise in a kingdom. Default value is 240.
Daily Chance To Start Rebel Faction
The daily chance for a clan to start a rebel faction. Default value is 100%.
Daily Chance To Join Rebel Faction
The daily chance for a clan to join a rebel faction that they would support. Default value is 100%.
Daily Chance To Start Civil War
The daily chance for a faction with enough support to start a civil war. Default value is 50%.
The maximum amount of time that a faction can last without engaging in a civil war. Default value is 120.
The influence cost of starting a faction. Default value is 100.
Score modifier affecting the tendency of clans to create or join factions. Increasing the modifier increases faction participation. Default value is 0.
